update tb_task
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
data_key = #{dataKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
command = #{command,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
period = #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delete_date = #{deleteDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
params = #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
sample_id = #{sampleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
datalist = #{datalist,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
readed = #{readed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_task set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_key = #{dataKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, command = #{command,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, period = #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_date = #{deleteDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, params = #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, sample_id = #{sampleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, readed = #{readed,jdbcType=INTEGER} where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update tb_task set state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_date = #{deleteDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_task set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_key = #{dataKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, command = #{command,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, period = #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_date = #{deleteDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, params = #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, sample_id = #{sampleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
,
from tb_task WHERE period=#{period} and app_id=#{appId} and state=#{state} ORDER BY task_id LIMIT 1
select count(command) runNum from tb_task where period=#{period} and app_id=#{appId} and state=#{state}

select t.app_id appId,t.user_id userId,t.params,a.title,a.method,a.app_name appName,u.username,u.email from tb_task t left join tb_app a on t.app_id=a.app_id left join tb_user u on t.user_id=u.user_id where project_id=#{projectId} group by project_id
mapper.update:
update tb_task
period = #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where project_id = #{projectId} and data_key = #{dataKey}
mapper.select:
select
from tb_task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} and data_key = #{dataKey}

select f.file_name,f.file_id,f.batch,f.another_name,s.sample_name,t.* from (select * from tb_task where (task_id in (select max(task_id) from tb_task where state=#{state} and user_id=#{userId} and (app_id=#{appId} or period!=2) group by data_key)) or (data_key is null and state=#{state} and user_id=#{userId} and app_id=#{appId}) )t left join tb_file f on f.data_key=t.data_key left join tb_sample s on s.sample_id=t.sample_id order by t.update_date desc,f.batch asc

select f.file_name,f.file_id,f.batch,s.sample_name,t.* from (select * from tb_task where task_id in (select max(task_id) from tb_task where state=#{state} and user_id=#{userId} and app_id=#{appId} group by data_key))t left join tb_file f on f.data_key=t.data_key left join tb_sample s on s.sample_id=t.sample_id where f.user_id=#{userId} and f.state=#{state} and f.batch=#{batch} and t.period=#{period} order by t.update_date desc

select f.file_name,f.file_id,f.batch,s.sample_name,t.* from (select * from tb_task where task_id in (select max(task_id) from tb_task where state=#{state} and ((user_id=#{userId} and app_id=#{appId}) or (app_id=#{appId} and sample_id in (select sample_id from tb_sample where user_id=#{userId} and state=#{state}))) group by data_key))t left join tb_file f on f.data_key=t.data_key left join tb_sample s on s.sample_id=t.sample_id where f.state=#{state} and f.batch=#{batch} and t.period=#{period} order by t.update_date desc

select f.file_name,f.file_id,f.batch,s.sample_name,t.* from (select * from tb_task where task_id in (select max(task_id) from tb_task where state=#{state} and ((user_id=#{userId} and app_id=#{appId}) or (app_id=#{appId} and sample_id in (select sample_id from tb_sample where user_id=#{userId} and state=#{state}))) group by data_key))t left join tb_file f on f.data_key=t.data_key left join tb_sample s on s.sample_id=t.sample_id where f.state=#{state} and f.batch=#{batch} and t.period=#{period} order by t.update_date desc

select
from tb_task WHERE data_key = #{dataKey} and state=#{state} and app_id=#{appId} and period = #{period} and project_id is null

select count(t.period) periodNum,t.period from (select * from tb_task where state=#{state} and user_id=#{userId} and (app_id=#{appId} or period!=2) group by data_key)t left join tb_file f on f.data_key=t.data_key where f.user_id=#{userId} and f.state=#{state} group by t.period
